EmailTemplate.name: Wedding Pro Welcome1
EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to Wedding Pro Community!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!User.Name} ,
Welcome to Wedding Pro Community! To get started, go to {!Community_Url}
Username: {!Receiving_User.FirstName}.{!Receiving_User.LastName}@weddingportal.com.
System will prompt you to setup a password.
Thanks,
The Knot World Wide
